actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to approve an application for a demonstration project submitted by Fresno County, California, and the California Department of Social Services.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to approve the application for a demonstration project submitted by Fresno County, California, and the California Department of Social Services to promote the employment of principal earners in the Aid to Families with Dependent Children (part A of title IV of the Social Security Act) program. Limits Federal funding for such project.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to approve an application for a demonstration project submitted by Fresno County, California, and the California Department of Social Services.
